turns.text: What changes do you feel have happened
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Oh I guess the first thing has been the uh for the right for women to vote I think that has been major change and also the fact that uh there are so mu- many more women in the work force nowadays than there were and thats probably going to increase
turns.label: sv

turns.text: It increases each year I think
turns.label: sv

turns.text: It sure does Yeah there is lot more women in the work place nowadays
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Well and I think women have kind of had uh in the past the real subservient --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well we do to some degree --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- but uh uh I think its not as much as it was
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Right yeah I I agree It definitely --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: And especially I think with women increasingly working theyre going to have to demand more from men
Because there is just i- impossible to keep up on everything else
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Have more of an active role in taking care of children more of an active role in taking care of the home
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well you know theyve been talking about - and I dont know uh what the status is on it but you know women get maternity leave and stuff like that and I know that theyve there has been discussion about men also getting maternity leave --
-- to help out but you know I havent really heard much about that recently
Well you know there is lot of companies that wont give mat- women maternity leave for that very reason
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Uh in fact I know the school districts down here you they dont have maternity leave Uh --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- you simply have to take accumulate your sick leave

And I dont know uh if bigger company companies do but when I was employed with the school district I didnt have maternity leave either and that was the reason because they thought was showing prejisim to women and not to men but
turns.label: h

turns.text: You have to save all of your uh vacation time
turns.label: sd

turns.text: You got to take the time off
You do You have to save all your vacation time and --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- thats usually how its uh happened but uh -
What do you see uh changing in the future
turns.label: qw

turns.text: I think that were probably going to see lot more companies uh run by females
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Right right upper management more women in upper management and probably uh well see more females in political roles More governors and I think you know roles like that
turns.label: aa

turns.text: That would be kind of nice
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Well weve got in Texas we have female governor
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And we had female mayor here in Dallas and she just her term just ended and uh so I think were probably going to see more of that --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- I think thats probably good little more integration
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And uh maybe not so much that we sit on the back burners and -
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Right you know I mean and thats fine with me --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- but sometimes - I mean Im not womens libber by any means but --
-- I do - there are issues that you know as far as like equal pay for men and women and that kind of stuff I totally am for
But I dont get into the uh the real --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I dont think theyre ever going to prove that men and women are equal
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And uh Im not capable of lifting what uh man can lift and --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- you know that type of that type of thing but uh --

-- one of the big changes uh theyre doing in Salt Lake is uh - and theyre probably - Im sure in Dallas since youre big places lot more women are uh working right out of their home with their Cs or with their lap computers or whatever
Yeah I Ive heard of that Uh I havent really talked to anybody thats you know too involved with that But I mean I think that is -
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Like the cottage industry Is is that what youre talking about women working out of their homes
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah uh I think its wonderful
turns.label: bk

turns.text: Right You only have to check in with the office once or twice week and -
turns.label: b

turns.text: Course theyre talking about uh that were going to be able to do our grocery shopping and --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: By the phone and all that
-- everything like that so uh it would be kind of exciting in some ways to to see little bit more of that and some ways it might be kind of scary
Think anybody could do it but
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah I wouldnt mind just calling up the grocery store and giving them my order and --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- going an hour later and picking it up
Right but then you know there is the process of selection Would you have to give them --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- the brand and uh slash error
You know when you shop you usually compare the prices and would be nice though
